炵字的基本解释

炵
tōng
〔炵炵〕火势旺盛的样子，如“头上火焰而炵炵……足下青波而浩浩。”

炵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tōng］
［《廣韻》他冬切，平冬，透。］
［《廣韻》徒冬切，平冬，定。］
火盛貌。

炵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　炵； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页669第03
【廣韻】【集韻】?他冬切，音㤏。【玉篇】火焱也。【廣韻】火色。【集韻】火盛貌。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?徒冬切，音彤。【廣韻】火威貌。

炵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
炵字的起名意思

火势旺盛的样子，如炵炵。

炵
Basic explanation of words
炵
tōng
〔炵炵〕The fire is vigorous, such as "the flame on the head makes the 炵炵...the step is blue and vast."
炵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tōng］
["Guangyun" he cuts in winter, flat winter, and through. ]
["Guangyun" Tu Dongqie, Pingdong, Ding. ]
The fire is grand.
炵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　炵; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 669 03
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? His winter cut, sound 㤏. [Jade articles] Huo Yan also. [Guang Yun] Fire color. 【Jiyun】Huosheng appearance.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun] again? Tu Dongqie, Yintong. [Guang Yun] Fire and beauty.
